name: Fire Tends to Burn You
description:
DESCRIPTION

30 levels of classic retro platforming fun! Can you beat all of them as fast as possible? 

Speedrun the game with the least amount of deaths possible while aiming for the highest score. Enjoy a exciting yet challenging experience!

And remember... Fire Tends to Burn You!

ALSO

if you do finish the game, feel share your time and deaths. My best is 12:36 and 87 deaths!!
